senses.sense_definition: A surname of Armenian, Persian, Turkish, or Assyrian Neo-Aramaic origin.

examples.text: Andre <w>Agassi</w> is widely considered one of the greatest tennis players in history.
We checked the guest list to see if Mr. <w>Agassi</w> had arrived yet.

senses.sense_definition: A young, usually unmarried Korean woman; often used as a polite form of address equivalent to "Miss".

examples.text: The shopkeeper politely called the customer <w>agassi</w> when handing her the receipt.
She explained that <w>agassi</w> is the respectful term used to address a young lady in Korea.
